content:
Deities @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Chohar]{Chohar}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Droskar]{Droskar}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Lissala]{Lissala}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Mammon]{Mammon}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Sairazul]{Sairazul}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.The Path of the Heavens]{The Path of the Heavens}

Domain Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Practice Makes Perfect]{Practice Makes Perfect}; Advanced Domain Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Tireless Worker]{Tireless Worker}

You work constantly and refuse to let anything stand in your way.
name: Toil Domain
